professional_summary: Experienced Engineering Technician with extensive background in civil engineering, specializing in design/drafting, storm water utility assessment, surveying, and construction inspection. Proven expertise in using various technical software and equipment for infrastructure projects.

work_experience.description: Civil engineering technician focusing on capital improvement projects and infrastructure management
responsibilities: Design and drafting of capital improvement projects using Microstation and GeoPak
Storm Water Utility Assessment using ArcView and Microsoft Access
Performing topographic surveys with Trimble GPS and Topcon Total Station
Maintaining base map drawings of subdivisions and infrastructure

work_experience.description: Senior role handling surveying, construction inspection, and design projects
responsibilities: Conducting topographic, land, and construction surveys
Construction inspection for various infrastructure projects
Design of street reconstruction and storm sewer projects
Drafting survey plats and corner certificates using AutoCAD and Eagle Point
